Get Destination Lists in Umbrella
agents.description: Retrieve a list of Destinations Lists using the Cisco Umbrella Management API

agents.name: Append Domain IOC to IOC Sunset Resource
agents.description:
Append a string or an array to a resource. If the resource has a test value this can be modified by using the is_test parameter.

Link to API documentation: https://www.tines.com/api/resources/append-element

local.final_payload:
=REJECT(
  LOCAL.all_parameters,
  LAMBDA(
    item,
    OR(
      item = NULL,
      IF(
        OR(
          TYPE(item) = "TrueClass",
          TYPE(item) = "FalseClass",
          TYPE(item) = "Integer"
        ),
        IS_EMPTY(TEXT(item)),
        IS_EMPTY(item)
      )
    )
  )
)

agents.description:
Remove a top level element from an array or key from an object in a resource. The request returns the removed item. If the resource has a test value this can be modified by using the is_test parameter.

Link to API documentation: https://www.tines.com/api/resources/remove-element

local.final_payload:
=REJECT(
  LOCAL.all_parameters,
  LAMBDA(
    item,
    OR(
      item = NULL,
      IF(
        OR(
          TYPE(item) = "TrueClass",
          TYPE(item) = "FalseClass",
          TYPE(item) = "Integer"
        ),
        IS_EMPTY(TEXT(item)),
        IS_EMPTY(item)
      )
    )
  )
)

agents.name: Remove Domain IOC from the IOC Sunset List resource
agents.description:
Remove a top level element from an array or key from an object in a resource. The request returns the removed item. If the resource has a test value this can be modified by using the is_test parameter.

Link to API documentation: https://www.tines.com/api/resources/remove-element

local.final_payload:
=REJECT(
  LOCAL.all_parameters,
  LAMBDA(
    item,
    OR(
      item = NULL,
      IF(
        OR(
          TYPE(item) = "TrueClass",
          TYPE(item) = "FalseClass",
          TYPE(item) = "Integer"
        ),
        IS_EMPTY(TEXT(item)),
        IS_EMPTY(item)
      )
    )
  )
)

agents.name: Is the IOC Present on the Sunset List?

diagram_notes.content: # Schedule the sunsetting of domains when the story is published.  Currently, it is set to 90 days, but that can be changed in the first filter action.
# Add/remove IOCs from the sunset list.

# Requirements
- Create a Cisco Umbrella API Key/Credential scoped for R/W Policies>Destination Lists.
- Create a Tines Resource for the Domain Sunset List.
- Create a Tines Resource for Cisco Umbrella Policy Number.
- Run the Get Destination Lists in Umbrella action to obtain the Policy Number for the Global Block List.
# There is a remove action in the webform to remove a domain if it was blocked in error.
# In the append IOC info action, you can change the "domain" key to URL or
If a domain is not on the domain sunset list, it will generate a null value when updating the resource.  Tines removes a random resource, so this trigger prevents this error.

fields.name: Heading
fields.content: Add or Remove Destinations in Cisco Umbrella

fields.name: Destinations
fields.description: Add or remove destinations to the Cisco Umbrella Global Block List using comma separated values.

fields.name: Paragraph
fields.content: Use the panel on the left to style and manage your page. Edit, sort, and delete page elements by selecting them on the page. And add new elements by dragging them from the left panel and onto the page.

action_inputs.name: Resource ID
action_inputs.description: The ID of the resource you are querying for. You can identify this with the INFO key.

action_inputs.name: Index
action_inputs.description: The index of the element to remove if removing from an array (with indexes starting at 0). You must use either the key or index parameter.

action_inputs.name: Is test resource?
action_inputs.description: Select 'yes' to remove an element from the test resource.

action_inputs.name: Key
action_inputs.description: The object key to remove if removing from an object. You must use either the key or index parameter.

action_inputs.name: Resource ID
action_inputs.description: The ID of the resource you are querying for. You can identify this with the INFO key.

action_inputs.name: Is test resource?
action_inputs.description: Select 'yes' to append an element to the test resource.

action_inputs.name: Array value
action_inputs.description: The array to append to the resource. Use this input instead of the 'Text value' input if you are appending an array.

action_inputs.name: Text value
action_inputs.description: The text to append to the resource. Use this input instead of the 'Array value' input if you are just appending text.

action_inputs.description: The ID of the resource you are querying for. You can identify this with the INFO key.

action_inputs.description: The index of the element to remove if removing from an array (with indexes starting at 0). You must use either the key or index parameter.
